topic.title: TOR not working???
topic.body: Is it just me?? for the last week zeronet simply will not work through the tor browser... zeroid, zeromail, zerosites... will not work. I can load other sites from seed but new content will not work... i switched over to use a normal browser today and everything seem to be working fine but NOPE not on tor... is it just me?? @nofish

topic.title: Zeronet APP???
topic.body: I assume there is not app for mobile... cuz i have looked and cannot find it. I would really like to see one of you brilliant coders to make a zeronet app... With all the censorship talk going around we need all the forms of internet access to be able to run zeronet!! Please make it so there is no fucking root or terminal shit to run...

topic.title: Zeronet's Monetary System: NANO
topic.body:
What should the main crypto coin be that we start to accept and mass adopt to be Zeronets primary coin of use??

My vote is for NANO: heres why...

Im a business man i understand MONEY! I know what real money is, i know what real assets are, and i know how to gain a LOT of both... Nano out of all coins (all i have seen at least) is the best thing to happen in the money space since the discovery of GOLD!! 

Nano is the purest and closest coin to gold and silver (I know there are gold and silver backed coins) MONEY is what we all want but few of us actually know what real money is. Real money is the â€œPEOPLES MONEYâ€ aka â€œGODS MONEYâ€ Gold and Silver its the only form of money that has ever truly worked in its pure form.  NANO in order for it to be consider money it needs to meet 8 requirementsâ€¦ 1. Medium of exchange 2. A unit of account 3. Portable 4. Durable 5. Divisible 6. Fungible (interchangeable) 7. Store of value 8. Max number reached (I added this) NANO meets all these requirement and in a very spectacular way!! NANO can work offline only needing to update every so often, is instant transaction, decentralized, green (the reason POW coins will ALL eventually fail)!!! I have been in crypto since 2010 and other than btc when I first found it nothing has gotten me as excited as this!! Since 2016 my websites all have a 20% discount if you pay in NANO and is the only coin I accept and also one of the only coins I hodl!! As the world continues to learn how paper assets are created by the devil himself more and more people will turn to NANO through their education about what real money isâ€¦ You seeâ€¦ the reason why gold and silver is the only real money until NANO is because it boils down to this. You have yours and I have mine, if I pay you, then you have more and I have less. SIMPLE. Its mostly called gods money for this one reason. There is only x amount of it in existence and the price only fluctuates with supply and demand. Until paper assets started to dictate the price, gold and silver only went up in value when the population grew and only went down when the population shrunk or more gold was mined. All the more reason why I listed number 8! 

This is my suggestion for anyone making a site that sells products on Zeronet! I would love to hear other ideas on what coin should be use primarily cuz well FUCK BTC it will die eventually due to time, and cost to run alone.

topic.title: Qubes OS + 0net??
topic.body:
Read More

At the risk of the toxic ass people here on zeronet bashing my head in for asking a question... Imma ask it anyways...

If you was to use qubes os on a live USB/SD card. In conjunction with zeronet would this effectively allow you to host anonymous websites on zeronet? like 100% anon due to the compartmentalized vm's that qubes offers

1565645808_1NkqJSocDr3nAa6WWDCAHgtf3ftwB.body:
I consider myself an anarchist, but i dont understand why you need to be anti capitalist... Im primarily a capitalist!! I own multiple business, business for me is like a game. Competition breeds excellence!! So yeah sure when something you worked hard for went to shit from p2p that just means you as a capitalist fucked up ðŸ¤£ anarchist has many faces... simply choose the one that fits your's. 

if it dont make $ then it dont make Â¢

> [memesadler](#comment_43_194xi8BJsLXhwje1kBJETKo6tjvhHmK73S): "Supreeeemacy" is scarecrow argument created by jewish hate groups such as the ADL and SPLC to target advocates for white well-being and white welfare. I don't care for your free market hot take on how the invisible hand selected the group of plutocrats and pedophiles we see in the higher echelons of power today. The fact is that this group has a disproportionate amount of power which it uses to abuse my people and dispossess of them from their ancestral homelands.I would ask why you're making the Ayn Rand argument and an apologist for capitalism when it comes to one very specific group who holds a disproportionate amount of wealth and institutional power. This being your suggestion they've earned their position in the bourgeois through their high IQ and ability, which is a free market argument that they obtained their power and privilage through meritocracy.

i dont quite follow your statement entirely (low iQ i guess) but as far as disproportionate wealth and power goes... 2 years ago i was $28,000 in debt and lost my job... out of sheer refusal to accept defeat i rose up slowly. It was incredibly hard work but i managed to do it... With the last $500 i had to my name i started a business, after incredible hard challenges i now make in 1 month what would of taken me almost 4 years to make!!

I did this 100% on my own, no silver spoon, no college education, no credit score... I DIDNT HAVE FUCKING SHIT! So when it come to arguing that the capitalist are somehow just handed their power, or deprive others of it is just simply BS!

You dont ever hear us talk about it cuz for many of us its hard to admit or hard to relive, but for the sake of helping others to understand ill say it now...

They dont tell you, we lose friends and family members. They dont tell you, how many sacrifices we make, they dont tell you, how we have to work 22 hours a day. They dont tell you, how many times we cried on our knees praying for help that never came. They dont tell you, that we failed (i failed 12 times before i made $1M) They dont tell you that you have to eat pbnj, Ramon, n bologna for years (i cant remember the last time i went out to eat) They dont tell you, that the employees have a better life than we do!! They dont tell you, that this is the hardest thing you will ever do in your life! They just dont tell you this shit... I could go on but i think you get it now... Sure some of use capitalist are born with a silver spoon "Trump" but majority of us worked incredibly hard for it and because of that is why we also defend capitalism because we dont want to see something that was so hard for us to master fall to shit birds. ðŸ™

> [memesadler](#comment_45_194xi8BJsLXhwje1kBJETKo6tjvhHmK73S): Banks borrow money from the federal reserve at 3% and charge ridiculous rates such as 20% and 35%. Why can't the federal reserve loan to the public at 3%, eh? I guess they get these sweetheart deals by pulling their self up by the bootstraps.Additionally, the capitalist class has pushed for open borders in order to drive down the wages of working class by increasing the supply of labor. We've only seen the cost of living increase while wages have stagnated or decreased. The only costs which have decreased have been for entertainment.

The federal reserve cant do what your wanting because if they did the entire house of cards would collapse. See ever since 1971 when Nixon took us off the gold standard. At the exact time is when the US government gave itself the right to print any amount of money they wanted to... In order for that money to no inflate (well not as bad...) they gave the banks whats called Fractional Reserve Banking... This give the bank the power to loan out more money than what they actually have in reserve. By doing this the bank is essentially creating the money that the government already printed and was inflated but now deflated back to level consensus.

So basically the bank can loan you 100$ for every 10$ they have in assets... And with this power of knowledge if you are ever sued for defaulting a payment from a bank simply require a jury of peers and explain this to the jury and say i will agree to pay but only what i actually owe them and thats 10%... 

As far as the cost of living goes... This ultimately boils down to the most simple business anyone can start, even with ZERO knowledge on markets.. Thats buying property and then charging whatever price you want... I have seen massive fluctuation in house costs simply based on types of people owning the property... In Indiana a 2,000sq home costs 130,000$ but if you go to a place like New Mexico the Mexicans with zero business knowledge are charging 350,000$ for same size and type of home... its the financially uneducated that are being greedy... So if you live in an area that has ethnic minorities that own the housing, then yes your cost of living will SUUUCK!! Im just talking about this from my own observations of living in many different states...

1565638982_1Hb5zuymuNq9rhYhhoYuAPGMXpxsp.body:
hahahahahaha Look even before i started my business that makes me ALOT of money. I was a worker too just like many of you... Even back then i lived by a saying "work smarter not harder" many ways of interpreting that quote... 

But when i got into business for myself and was struggling a mentor of mine basically told me the same quote just a little different "the poor leverage their time for money, the rich leverage their money for time" If you follow this quote then you can easily understand how Howard was able to leverage his money to buy him 389 times... MORE TIME!!

Its frustrating that so many people look at rich like were greedy getting paid so much more than the small guy... but in reality YOUR the greedy one!! What jobs do you provide to others? How many charities do you donate to? How many families are not starving because of the jobs you provide???? No none rite... all you do with your money is buy food of YOU, buy a car for YOU, buy a house for YOU! Someone asks for some money, you say you dont have any... 

Ask the richest person you know if you can buy them dinner, take them to a place that you need to walk by some homeless people... see what they do..???? Compared you what the rest of you would do... Justify not giving them money because oh they will just by booze (then you by booze) or they will just buy drugs with it, some lame shit to make you sleep better at night...

Before this gets to long, one of the things on my bucket list to do... is to pick up a random homeless person and without giving them anything more than a room for 3 days and some money for clothe. I want to show them how to go from homeless to RICH in 1 year!! IMMA DO IT TO!!!

> [xcape2net](#comment_290_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): I do love decentralization.  But, remember files are only there as long as at least one person has them on their computer.  So, IPFS files don't necessarily last forever.

your totally right!! Mine will though because of the desktop client i use for it. Its always running in the background. Its got a bandwidth ticker on it so you can see how much data your using to support the network... its less thatn 200kb most of the time... so if more people use the same client im using then the network will grow massive. currently adoption is slow because all the how to's only how using terminal to install... the one im using was just install like normal apps...

1565877012_1PPUrYcZ1E1rGkkE6PH18Qi43LRsK.body:
WOW. This post is totally opposite of why i got on Zeronet in the first place... The world is at a very trick time rite now. The internet which by nature was intended to be open and support freedom of speech, on of the main liberties the government is ACTIVELY trying to get rid of. Along with right to bare arms, right to the pursuit of happiness, freedom of religion, freedom in general... That are setting us all up in some very shady way... allowing 9-11 to happen so they could launch NSA and CIA spying on people for "national security" or making a law that child porn is illegal just to get inside peoples minds like somehow a young girl that wants to be a model is hurt mentally by taking nude photos common fuck off this is a set up to lead into the removal of pursuit of happiness. Every year they either create or allow a mass shooting in some school, church, or most recently a Walmart... Wait why a walmart?? oh yeah its because the other places that we meant to strike you down emotionally was not working... So they changed their script to target the majority... Cuz who in America is not in a Walmart on a weekly basis??? just 2 days after the shoot i took my mom to one and she was looking all over for a shooter, she even told me i dont feel safe in here... 

This scares the fuck out of me people!! This last shooting in El Paso just might lead to the take away of our gun... When that happens America will instantly try to become the next Hitler. Dont take my word for it do your own research its almost on a biological clock that at certain times throughout history someone in power attempts to take over the world.

So having something like zeronet!! WITHOUT any intentional actions to white label sites is truly what is needed simply by me submitting this post some fucking mind fucked bible thumper could try to build a case to say im some kind of nut job for thinking this OUTLANDISH thought! Like its now a new crime to have a fucking brain of your own!

I 100% support Zeronet AND Tor!! The world that brought us into modern day society really only had one law... 

THE LAW OF THE JUNGLE - it dictates this: Dont fuck with the wrong person because you dont know who he know or what hes capable of just like he dont know you, who you know, or what your capable of... This renders every possible illegal action to a stalemate and Ultimately leads to a better society cuz no one would do shit to fuck with someone else unless it was REQUIRED "Eye for an eye, tooth for a tooth"

We never really had problems like we do in society today. Until the rich started to make their own security force AKA police that then lead into judges, lawyers, politicians, and lastly GREED. People go to jail now with ZERO proof, people are sued for ZERO proof. IT horrible!! and havign a place on the DW to find out who is actively fighting back is the only chance we have... Im not tyring to radicalize anyone here but common you got a brain.... tell me shits all hunky dory????

ok i just a few mins ago came to this realization... hear me out and give feedback!!

If you look at everything in the news today about racism, abortion, and a whole fuckton of other topics.. what this tells me is the real problem is our society is that... people actually thing their opinion counts and to make it worse they think that everyone should just fall in line with their views as if they were king!!

I was just in the shower where i have my best moments... ðŸ¤” what if censorship is really what is needed to better society...??? if you think about it. Imagine if no one could talk about racist this or racist that, would this eventually lead to no more racism? Simply because no one ever talks about it?? or maybe if we were not allowed to talk about other things that are ultimately  harming our progress in society, would this all actually lead to a better way of life??

Naturally this notion goes against every bone in my body. I love freedom. But i also am big enought to accept a different view if it makes since to adopt...

Let me hear some peoples thoughts on this...

> [bigbadbob](#comment_476_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): I took me a long time to figure this saying out...  Is it better to be right or happy?   Words mean little when interacting with people.  If you are at work and not happy or angry with something your co workers do you need to be calm yourself before you approach them.  If your intensity level is at a 10 then your words mean nothing.  Right or happy?If you are feeling happy or calm when you bring up issues and remain calm and help them draw their own conclusions rather than simply telling them they are wrong, it might be more effective.   People are easy to repel with body language even if you are right.  Just work on calming yourself and avoid arguing.  Suggestions are received better than random instruction.  It just takes some practice and the key is yourself.   Perfectionism does not bring happiness or impress others.  Need a better balance.

thank you. This is probably the most useful information in all of Zeronet. The toxic level is off the CHARTS!!

> [bigbadbob](#comment_511_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): You are welcome. Glad you find this useful and hope it can be helpful for you.  One thing you might find interesting is CBT(Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) You could research it online.  I have found it to be most useful for myself.  It's a simple concept that takes practice.  In essence,  Its about our own thoughts and how quickly we react to beliefs that may or may not be accurate.  Its about slowing down the process and basically questioning everything. And being aware of our many automatic thoughts that happen very quickly and go unnoticed.  If we can have better control of our automaitic thoughts.. we then should have better control of our automatic reactive behavior.   And in theory.. life, interactions, and stress levels should automatically get better.  I think they should teach it in school, but it would go against the status quo.  It's worth checking out if you have not already.
